text: You are also to provide with it every morning a grain offering of a sixth of an ephah 46:14 A sixth of an ephah is approximately 3.3 dry quarts or 3.7 liters (probably about 4.2 pounds or 1.9 kilograms of flour). with a third of a hin of oil 46:14 Or a third of a hin of olive oil; that is, approximately 1.3 quarts or 1.2 liters to moisten the fine flourâ€”a grain offering to the LORD. This is a permanent statute.
